name: Brew (Robloxillian, GlitterPixel, Telsy, InsultingBagel)
description: All code and assets for Brew were created in two weeks as a submission for the itch.io Cozy Autumn Game Jam. Everything in the game was made by our small team of programmers, artists, and composers, with the exception of the dialogue system, which uses the open-source Unity plugin developed by PixelCrushers.
